msbt.message: Hey there! Welcome to Able Sisters, where we sell fashions made lovingly by claw.
Oh, hey, it's the great spot finder, !Thanks for picking this fantastic location for us!
Oh! Hey, ! Welcome to our new shop! Pretty great, right?
We've decided to put down roots here on and keep selling our clothes and accessories.
Hmmwe haven't met before, have we? Well, I'm Mabel and it's a pleasure to meet you.
Here at Able Sisters, we carry a variety of apparel, shoes, and accessories, all lovingly clawmade.

Here, let me give you a quick tour of our shopOK, sowhen you first walk in, you'll find our recommended items right there, front and center. We change these up every single day. You know, to keep things fresh!Then, over on the left, you'll find our mannequins. They're dressed up in whatever seasonal outfits we're into. We change 'em up from time to time rather than daily. Still, we hope you'll be inspired! And of course, if you see something on the mannequins you love, you're more than welcome to buy it. Which brings us to the back wall Here you'll find custom designs brought in by our customers. We'd LOVE to display your designs, of course. And if you want any of these designstheir yours for free! Now, the last thing I want to tell you about is the fitting room. It's on the right side of the shop in the back. This is where you go to try on anything that's available for sale that day, including all the color variations. Our display space is limited, so the fitting room is also the place to check out items we couldn't put out. Yeah, the fitting room is really great. And it's a great way to see how an outfit is coming together.
We're open every day from 9 AM to 9 PM. I hope I'll be seeing you in here lots.
Thanks! Please come again.
Oh! Never mind, then.
Wuh-oh! We've got a minor situation here: your pockets are full. Come on back when you've fixed that.
Oooooh! Um, looks like you're a little short of Bells
Great!<10_4 /> That'll be .
All done? Nothing caught your eye?
Hello there!
Thanks so much! I'll just take that tailors ticket off your handsI hope you enjoy your new !
Whoa! Sometimes, when I start talking about the shop, I just go on and on. Anyway, were you interested in something from the custom-design space?
Whoa! I guess I get kind of chatty when I talk about the shop.Anyway, it looked like you were interested in what's behind the curtain
Oh! I guess I get kind of chatty when I talk about the shop.Sorry, were you interested in something that mannequin is wearing?
EhI guess I get kind of chatty when I talk about the shop. Were you interested in this item?
Oh, ? That's . Interested?
I'll buy!
I'll pass.
Oh, that was designed by my sister, Label! Isn't it fantastic?
That one costs . Do you want to buy it?
I'll buy!
I'll pass.
Oh, looks like you've got a tailors ticket! You can use that for anything up to .
That is , so you can use a ticket for it. Do you want it?
Use a ticket.
Pay with Bells.
I changed my mind.
Oh, hang on!
I should have said this sooner, but thanks for choosing such a great location for our shop!
Oh, I was gonna find you and let you know that we opened a shop, but you obviously figured it out!
Hello there! We haven't met before, have we? I'm Mabel!
Please, take a look around!
We change our lineup every day, so be sure to check back regularly!
Most of the stuff we carry is made here in the shop by my sister!
You can try on anything you like in the fitting room to the right. Feel free to use it whenever!
If you see anything you like, just let me know!
